attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-0461

Date: 2007-03-30

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Barbara L. Baird de la ville de Fredericton dans la province du Nouveau‑Brunswick, l'une des conseillères juridiques de Sa Majesté, soit nommée juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Nouveau‑Brunswick, Division de la famille, et juge ex officio de la Cour d'appel du Nouveau‑Brunswick.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Barbara L. Baird, of the City of Fredericton in the Province of New Brunswick, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, Family Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Barbara L. Baird, of the City of Fredericton in the Province of New Brunswick, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, Family Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.
